Control Name: 2.17.10 There is awareness around how the application has been built and is being maintained (in house or via an external partner).
Control Statement: Exploring where technical delivery capabilities reside helps to qualify operational model boundaries and estimate the cost of operating the application as well as defining a budget and cost model.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.17 What operational excellence allowances for cost have you made?
